titleStmt.title: SII 32, part 2, no. 104: original edition by S. Swaminathan
No. 104. (A.R. No. 158 of 1929.) GŌVINDAPUTTŪR, UDAIYARPALAIYAM TALUK, TIRUCHIRAPPALLI DISTRICT.

summary.p: On the north wall, central shrine, Gaṅgājaṭādhara temple.

Incomplete. Records that Śekkiḻān Araiyaṉ Saṅkaranārāyaṇaṉ alias Śōḻa Muttaraiyaṉ, a native of Kāvaṉṉūr in Paḷuvūr-kūṟṟam in Toṇḍai-nāḍu endowed two vēli, thirteen mā and 1 kāṇi of land under the irrigation of lake Vaḍakuḍi, purchased from the sabhaiyār of Chandaśēri and got the same made tax-free (iṟaiyili). He entrusted the same to the sabhā of Chōḷasūḍāmaṇi-chēri, who were the members of the peruṅguṟiāḷuṅgaṇattār of Periyavāṉavaṉmādēvi for the sake of various services to god Paramasvāmigaḷ of Śrī-Kayilāyam in Periyavāṉavaṉmādēvich-chaturvēdimaṅgalam and also determined the extent of the endowed land that would be required to provide the paddy necessary to conduct each of the various rituals and services.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kopparake[sa]ripamṉamārāṉaRead kopparakesaripanmarāṉa śrī Uttamacoḻaṟku
yāṇṭu 10 2 Āvatu vaṭakarai brahmateyam periyavāṉavaṉ mā
deviccaturvetimaṅkalattu śrī kayilāyattu paramasvāmikaḷukku to
ṇṭaiṉāṭu paḷuvūr koṭṭattu kāvaṉṉūr cekkiḻān Araiyaṉ caṅkaranā
rāyaṇaṉāṉa coḻamuttaraiyaṉaṉeṉ Iṉta periyavāṉavaṉ mātevi peruṅkuṟi
yāḷḷumkaṇattāruḷ śrīcoḻacūḻāmaṇiceri sabhaiyārkku Iṟaiyili mikai
vicattil Iṭṭa nilam vaṭakuṭi Erikiḻ cantaceri sabhaiyār pakkal nān yiṟai
yili koṇṭu Uṭaiya nilammāvatu yivvūr vaṭakuṭi Eri kiḻ parakeycari vākkā
lukku vaṭakkum vaṭakuṭi Eritalaikaṇi vākkāllukku kiḻakkum vaṭavāṟṟukku me
kkum śrīcoḻacūḻāmaṇiceriyār muṉ viṟṟa nilam Iraṇṭāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu nikka muṉṟāṅkaṇṇāṟu
nilaṅ kaṇṇāṟum Añcāṅ Āṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟum Eḻāṅ kaṇṇāṟum māka nilam Iraṇṭaraiye muṉṟu māk
kāṇiyum Ivūr śrī kayillātattuRead śrīkayilāsattu mahādevaṟku candrādittavaṟ nivantam ceytapaṭi Āḻvārkku tiruamutukku potu nā
nāḻiyāka muṉṟu sandhikkum Arici kuṟuṇi nā(ṉ)ṉāḻi kuttalariciyiṉāl nel mukkuṟuṇi Aṟunāḻiyiṉāl Orāṭṭai nāḷaikku nel
nūṟṟu Oru pattu Irukalane tūṇipatakkukkum ceyta nilamāvatu muṉṟām kaṇṇāṟṟu kulai Araimā Arai muṉtirikai Āḻvārk
ku ney Amutu nicatam Uḻakkukku nelkuṟuṇiyum kaṟi Amutukku nel ṉānāḻiyum tayiramutukku nel muṉṉāḻiyu
riyum Aṭaikkāyamutukku nel yiru nāḻiyum Āka nel nicatam nel kuṟuṇi Eḻu ṉāḻināl Orāṭṭai nāḷai nellu Aimmattu
Aṟukalaney mukkuṟuṇiyināl Iṭṭa nilam nālāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu mekkaṭaiya nāṉku mākāṇi Araikkāṇi nikki Iṉ kiḻakku Iṭṭa ni
lam muṉṟu mākkaāṇi muntirikai śaṅśrān=tikaḷ Ayanam miraṇṭum vi[ṣu] Iraṇṭum vaiykāci vicākamum Āka ḷaḍha4 saṅ
grān=tiyum napaṉamāṭi Aruḷa Abhiṣekadakṣiṇaikku ruḷi tiru Amutu ceyyavum nel Aimpatiṉ kalat
tāl Iṭṭa nilam nālāṅ kaṇṇāṟu mekkaṭaiya munṟu mā Araikkāṇi tiruppukaikkum tirucantaṇattu Orāṭṭai nāḷaikku ne
l Irupatin kalattāl Iṭṭa nilam nālāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu Itaṉanoṭu paṭaiyaRead maṭaiyamākāṇi tirupaḷḷitāmatoṭuppārkkum tirumeḻukku Iṭuvaārk
kum Iṭṭa nilam nālāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu kaṟiyamutukku Iṭṭa nilattukku kiḻakku Araimā Itanoṭum kiḻakkaṭaiya tiruviḻāvukku Aṭṭa
vuku kaṟikkum viṟakukkum Aṭṭuvittukum nicatam kalamāka nāḷ muku Eḻukkalattāl Iṭṭa nila mākāṇi muṉtirikai
yum Āka kaṇṇāṟṟuRead āṟāṅkaṇṇāṟṟuteṉkiḻakku nilam Araikāṇi vaiykāci vicākattukku tiruviḻāvukku Aṭa Arici patakkeḻu kuttal ni
catam Aiṅkalamāka nāḷ Eḻukku Arici muppattaiṅkalattāl nel Eṇpatiṉ kalattāl nilam Aiñcāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu kiḻal mel
teṟkaṭaiya nilam kāl tiruviḻāvukku nicatam Eṇṇai mukkuṟuṇi nāḷ Eḻukku kalane Irutūṇi kuṟuṇiyāka nāḻi Eṇ
ṇaikku tūnellā vaṉta nel Ampattaṟu kalattāl Iṭṭa nilam Itil vaṭakkaṭaiya kiḻal mel Iṭṭa nilam
mum māvarai putukkupuṟattu nellu nūṟṟu kalattāl Iṭṭa nilam Añcāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu nilam vaṭakkaṭai
ya kālum Āṟāṅkaṇṇāṟṟum kāṇi tiruviḷakku nicatam Eṇṇai nāḻikku nel tuṇiyāl nūṟṟuirupatiṉ kalattu
Āṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu mekkaṭaiya Eḻu māvarai Apiṣekam ceyu nampikku nicatam nel patakkin nāl Iṭṭa nilam
(ṅ) kiḻakku muṉṟu māmukkāṇi Uvaiccu Āḷ Āṟukku Iṭṭa nilam Eḻāṅ kaṇṇāṟṟu mekkaṭaiya Eṭṭu mā
kāṇi muṉtirikai tirunantavāṉam muṉṟukku Itaṉ Oru kiḻakkaṭaiya nilam Oru māvarai Itaṉ kiḻakku maṇṇu
lam Oru mā Itoṭum Aṭaiya kiḻakku nilam Irumāvum yika pukku paruṣaiyākku nila kāṇiyaraikkāṇi mun=tarikai kaṇkāṇi niṟp
pu Oruṇ Oraṭu Aṭainilam Oru mākaāṇi kā(ai)ṇikku
Digital edition of SII 32, part 2, no. 104 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
